events.message: I just received my order, but the item arrived with a large scratch on the front panel, which is really disappointing.
The case has been categorized under Product Defect due to the reported scratch and damage on the item.
The support request has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the product defect issue.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your item. I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and the package it arrived in? This will help us assess the damage quickly.
I have attached several photos showing the scratch on the item as well as the box. It looks like the damage happened during shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement item sent immediately with expedited shipping or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the prompt response and assistance.
The replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We appreciate your patience and apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement item arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we haven’t heard back and the replacement was delivered successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
